items.title: Casino Bug Hunting
items.description: Systematically identified bugs in casino systems, achieving a Return to Player rate exceeding 100%.

items.title: YouTube Channel Search
items.description: Developed a web application for advanced YouTube channel searching with error-tolerant search and extensive filtering options.

items.title: Deal Scraper
items.description: Created a web scraper tracking restaurant deals, generating 10 daily visits and over 1,000 interactions.

items.title: Moodle AI Plugin
items.description: Developed a Moodle plugin to automatically generate text for uploaded images using local or API-based AI.

fractal3D.title: Fractal3D
fractal3D.description: An interactive 3D fractal visualization tool using Three.js and WebGL
fractal3D.feature1: Real-time 3D rendering of complex fractal structures
fractal3D.feature2: User-controllable camera for exploring the 3D space
fractal3D.feature3: Customizable fractal parameters for unique visualizations
fractal3D.challenges: Optimizing performance for smooth rendering of complex 3D structures
fractal3D.learnings: Deepened understanding of 3D graphics programming and WebGL optimization techniques

fractalForest.title: Fractal Forest
fractalForest.description: A 2D fractal-based forest generator with interactive elements
fractalForest.feature1: Procedural generation of diverse tree structures using fractal algorithms
fractalForest.feature2: Interactive forest environment with day/night cycle
fractalForest.feature3: Customizable forest density and tree types
fractalForest.challenges: Balancing visual complexity with performance for larger forest scenes
fractalForest.learnings: Improved skills in procedural generation and creating interactive 2D environments

aStarSimulation.title: A* Pathfinding Simulation
aStarSimulation.description: An interactive visualization of the A* pathfinding algorithm in action
aStarSimulation.feature1: Real-time visualization of the A* algorithm's search process
aStarSimulation.feature3: Step-by-step playback of the pathfinding process
aStarSimulation.challenges: Optimizing the algorithm for smooth performance on complex grids
aStarSimulation.learnings: Gained deep insights into pathfinding algorithms and their applications in game development

asteroids.title: Asteroids Game
asteroids.description: A modern take on the classic Asteroids arcade game
asteroids.feature2: Procedurally generated asteroid fields with varying difficulty
asteroids.feature3: Power-ups and special weapons to enhance gameplay
asteroids.challenges: Implementing accurate collision detection and response
asteroids.learnings: Improved skills in game physics and procedural content generation

fourWins.title: 4 Wins Game
fourWins.description: A strategic two-player connection game with AI opponent
fourWins.feature1: Sleek, responsive game board with animated piece drops
fourWins.feature2: Intelligent AI opponent with adjustable difficulty levels
fourWins.feature3: Multiplayer mode for playing against friends
fourWins.challenges: Developing an efficient AI algorithm for competitive gameplay
fourWins.learnings: Enhanced understanding of game theory and AI decision-making processes
